level.heading: Vehicle reclamation period.
level.text: A vehicle that is towed and stored pursuant to this chapter shall be reclaimed within 28 days after the date of the notice sent pursuant to ยง 50-2702(a); except, that if the address of either the owner or the lienholders is unknown, the vehicle shall be reclaimed within 14 days after the publication date of reclamation notices under ยง 50-2702(b).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-139, see notes following ยง 50-2701.
